item.description: The zeroth Bernoulli number is telling us the energy over temperature of a quantum harmonic oscillator in the high-temperature limit. The rest of the Bernoulli numbers are telling us all the 'low-temp...
item.content:encoded: The zeroth Bernoulli number is telling us the energy over temperature of a quantum harmonic oscillator in the high-temperature limit. The rest of the Bernoulli numbers are telling us all the 'low-temperature corrections' to the oscillator's energy over temperature.
